data.title: Owen Wilson will be a “good dad, says his co-star Carly Craig
data.meta_description: The 'Little Fockers' star's girlfriend, Jade Duell, gave birth to a baby boy who they named Ford Linton Wilson last Friday (140111) in Hawaii and although the actor kept his partner’s pregnancy a secret until recently, his ‘Hall Pass’ co-star Carly thinks the actor will be a great parentShe explained: "He's actually really quiet
data.text:
The 'Little Fockers' star's girlfriend, Jade Duell, gave birth to a baby boy who they named Ford Linton Wilson last Friday (14.01.11) in Hawaii and although the actor kept his partner’s pregnancy a secret until recently, his ‘Hall Pass’ co-star Carly thinks the actor will be a great parent.

She explained: "He's actually really quiet. He's very reserved. He's just a normal sweet guy.

"I think he's going to be a good dad. Owen's normal, you know what I mean? He's not all crazy and wacky. He's not at all Hollywood. I think that makes a good parent."

Friends have previously revealed that 42-year-old Owen - who has been dating Jade for over a year - was "very excited and involved" in the pregnancy.

The source added: "He has been doing research and learning as much as he can.

"He's super into it and asks a lot of questions to make sure he knows what's going on every step of the way."

The baby, who weighed 6 pounds, 13 ounces, was reportedly born naturally via a water birth at Owen’s oceanfront home in Maui, with Jade's labour lasting 18 hours.

A source said: "Owen and Jade are thrilled! Owen has been doing a celebratory hula dance all afternoon! It's a beautiful boy and everyone is incredibly happy!"
